A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the First Star Wars film that left me stunned and not even giving it a round of applause. Giving the main character to contradict his past is the stupidest thing i have ever seen. Missing plots and characters\, 100% sexist\, jokes that aren't even suppose to be on there\, and no disrespect to Carrie Fisher but wtf was that scene all about? (to the people that seen it) there would have been a better way to give the character a better way to end her part but i found it extremely ridiculous.
